short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab interface with the peaceful beauty of nature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
brings calm and peaceful autumn scenery to your New Tab page. This extension not only refreshes your browser's interface but also provides useful features:

- Convenient search bar: Quickly search the web without leaving the New Tab page.
- Time updates: Displays the current time to help you stay on top of your schedule.
- Weather forecast: Shows the weather in your location, helping you better prepare for the day ahead.
Enjoy the tranquility of autumn, along with tools to help you manage your daily tasks effortlessly.
